instruction.title: Call 911 (607-255‐1111 for cell phones) and evacuate the building in cases of:
instruction.text:
• Fire
 • Smoke
 • Explosion
 • Structural damage or collapse
 • Uncontrolled gas leak
 • Uncontrolled chemical or hazardous material spills

instruction.title: Call 911 (607-255‐1111 for cell phones) and follow dispatcher instructions in cases of:
instruction.text:
• Unknown odors
 • Activated residence hall room smoke detectors
 • Hazardous conditions
 • Persons trapped in elevators

instruction.title: Call the Campus Life Facilities Office at (607) 255‐0423
instruction.text:
• Electrical outage
 • Flooding
 • Heating or air-conditioning failure
 • Building or room security issues

If the problem occurs between 5 p.m. and 8 a.m., or on weekends, call the Residential Program staff on call.

instruction.title: Call Facilities Customer Service at (607) 255‐5322
instruction.text:
• Electrical outage
 • Building flooding
 • Heating or air-conditioning failure
 • Water Leaks

In case of electrical emergencies, do not touch equipment that is smoking, sparking, tripping circuit breakers or giving electrical shocks.

instruction.title: Telephone or computer network failure
instruction.text: Call your unit’s network administrator or Cornell Information Technologies at (607) 255‐8990.
